categories.name: General Wash
categories.description: General body wash and interior cleaning

categories.name: Exterior Car Washing
categories.description: Washing off dirt and mud. Polishing to restore the cars shine. Wax application for added protection and a glossy finish.

categories.name: Interior Vacuuming and Cleaning
categories.description: Vacuuming, dusting, window cleaning, Interior wipe down (dashboards, consoles, door panels), leather conditioning, steam cleaning, deodorizing

categories.name: Engine Cleaning
categories.description: Cleaning the engine compartment to remove dirt and grime. Prevent overheating caused by dirt clogging the engines cooling system. Prolong the lifespan of engine components

categories.name: Undercarriage Cleaning
categories.description: Remove rust-causing elements. Protect against long-term wear and tear. Ensure better road handling.

categories.name: Car Detailing Services
categories.description: Clay bar treatment to remove embedded contaminants. Paint correction to restore the cars original finish. Application of ceramic coating for long-lasting paint protection.

categories.name: Polishing and Waxing
categories.description: Polishing removes minor scratches and imperfections from your cars paintwork, while waxing adds a protective layer to guard against environmental elements such as UV rays and rain. This service is ideal for keeping your car looking new and shiny.

categories.name: Waxing and Buffing
categories.description: Enhance the shine of the cars paint. Provide an extra layer of protection against environmental damage.

categories.name: Headlight Restoration
categories.description: Polishing to remove discoloration. Application of a protective sealant to prevent future damage.

categories.name: Tire and Rim Cleaning
categories.description: Tire cleaning to remove mud, grease, and brake dust. Polishing of rims to restore their shine. Application of tire dressing for a sleek, black finish.
